Adding a new page

To add new pages to the guide, first create a new Markdown file in the pages/ directory of the repository. As an example, the Markdown text for this page is pages/new-page.md.

The Markdown document begins with this YAML front matter:

---
permalink: /adding-a-new-page/
layout: default
title: Adding a new page
---

The / at the end of the permalink: attribute is important! It ensures the page is generated as /adding-a-new-page/index.html. Without it, it would be generated as adding-a-new-page.html.

Now click on the Adding Images entry in the table of contents to learn how to add images to your guide.

This project is maintained by 18F.

Hosted on 18F Pages.
